isis.stitle: International® T 444E Diesel Engine Service, Model Year 1994 - 1998 - THERMOSTAT AND COOLANT FILTER - Coolant Filter and Header - Installation (Left Side of Engine)

note.para: If the coolant filter header was not removed, proceed to Step 4.

step1.para: Install two mounting bolts to secure the coolant filter header to the crankcase. Tighten the bolts to the standard torque value.
Install the supply tube to the coolant filter header and the water pump housing assembly. Tighten the nuts.
Install the return tube to the coolant filter header and rear oil cooler header assembly. Tighten the nuts.
Apply coolant to the gasket of the coolant filter.
Install the new coolant filter. Tighten the filter one full turn after the gasket contacts the coolant filter header.
Turn the coolant filter shut off valves to the OPEN position to allow coolant to flow through the filter.
